sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் வழிநடத்து, ஆகாரம் கொடு, ஏற்று, நடத்திக்கொண்டு போய்விடு, நடத்திக்கொண்டுவா
to lead, to give rest, to lead with care, to guide to a watering place or station, to cause to rest, to bring to a station or place of rest, to guide, to refresh
1) to lead to a watering - place or station and cause to rest there
2)to lead or bring to a station or goal
2) to journey by stations or stages

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to run with a sparkle, that is, flow; hence (transitively) to conduct, and (by inference) to protect, sustain: - carry, feed, guide, lead (gently, on).
Cognate: H5095, H5096, H5097
